channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Powerball player in Arkansas has won a $1.817 billion lottery jackpot
item.description: Wednesday's Christmas Eve drawing ended the lottery game's three-month stretch without a top-prize winner. Final ticket sales pushed the jackpot highe...

item.title: Morning Edition hosts play 'Do You Know Your Ho-Ho-Ho!'
item.description: Morning Edition hosts Michel Martin and Leila Fadel answer holiday trivia questions compiled by Southern Living Magazine.

item.title: The real ping pong champion — and hustler — who inspired 'Marty Supreme'
item.description: Marty Reisman was nicknamed "The Needle" for his slender physique. He dressed well and put on a show.

item.title: A holiday tradition: David Sedaris reads from 'The Santaland Diaries'
item.description: Writer and humorist David Sedaris reads from his holiday essay "The Santaland Diaries."

item.title: Front-runner to be Bangladesh PM returns after 17 years in exile
item.description: Tarique Rahman, who has lived in London since 2008, arrives weeks before pivotal elections are held.

item.title: Virtual reality opens doors for older people to build closer connections in real life
Blast at Nigeria mosque kills 5, injures 35 in apparent suicide attack
item.description: A bomb exploded during prayers at a mosque in Nigeria, killing five people in what police described as a likely suicide attack.

item.title: Lottery jackpots are getting bigger and harder to win. Here are the numbers.
item.description: Here are the top 20 largest Powerball and Mega Millions jackpots, and the odds of winning them.

item.title: Is anything open on Christmas Day 2025? See which businesses are operating.
item.description: Most major retail stores and grocery chains are closed on Christmas Day, with some exceptions.

item.title: Storm system threatens more rainfall Christmas Day over waterlogged Southern California

item.description: Her Altadena home survived a wildfire, but now she faces the threat of mudslides; Why flamingos are returning to Florida

item.title: Watch: Moment robbers rip ATM from inside Texas store
item.description: The White Settlement Police Department is searching for two suspects.

item.title: Trump-backed candidate wins in knife-edge Honduran election
item.description: His rival Salvador Nasralla says he will not accept the result, but urges his supporters to remain calm.

item.title: Andreen McDonald: A Millionaire Vanishes
item.description: How a yellow hammer nailed a suspect in the case of a missing businesswoman. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

item.title: Turkey arrests 115 IS suspects 'planning New Year's attacks'
item.description: Turkish authorities say firearms were seized and efforts to trace further suspected members are continuing.

item.title: Waterskiing Santas and giant cuts of meat: Christmas around the world
item.description: From London to Bethlehem, services and festivities to mark the holiday cheer are in full swing.
